Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Andy Dufresne, a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for a murder he did not commit

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ who achieves great things in life

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son

Title: Titanic
Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic

Title: Schindler's List
Description: In German-occupied Poland during WWII, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce

Title: The Green Mile
Description: A death row corrections officer discovers supernatural events surrounding one of his inmates

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman general seeks revenge after being betrayed and forced into slavery

Title: The King's Speech
Description: King George VI overcomes his stammer with the help of an unorthodox speech therapist

Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Description: A Mumbai teen reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on a game show

Title: The Social Network
Description: The rise of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed its creation

Title: La La Land
Description: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles

Title: The Revenant
Description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear

Title: Black Swan
Description: A committed dancer struggles with the pressure of perfection and her own sanity

Title: No Country for Old Men
Description: A hunterâ€™s life turns upside down after discovering a drug deal gone wrong and a suitcase full of cash

Title: Everything Everywhere All At Once
Description: An unlikely hero must channel her newfound powers to fight bizarre and bewildering dangers across the multiverse

Title: Toy Story
Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Title: Finding Nemo
Description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

Title: Up
Description: 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his dream to see the wilds of South America by tying thousands of balloons to his house.

Title: Babe
Description: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

Title: The Sound of Music
Description: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
